name: Born on a Monday
description:
Born on a Monday is a text-based game targeted toward people affected by the ever expanding epidemic of isolation.

In the game, the main character risks its life to carve out a safe space for itself from a hostile environment, through decisive action, through knowing where to stand your ground and where to let things slide, and through perseverance. In its world, to live a life of monotony and mediocrity was worse than death, so you salvage for yourself the beginnings of respect, and, somehow, find yourself in a guard's uniform.

The game is meant to stir up intense feelings common among the isolated populations, and to deal with them, either to face it, or to make peace with it.
